name: Zenobia Pay
long_description:
Zenobia Pay makes payments software for luxury retailers to accept pay-by-bank to avoid fraud, chargebacks, and credit card fees. We're on a mission to make it 3x cheaper to transact online, handling payments for a 1% fee.

Zenobia Pay integrates to your store through our ecommerce plugins (Shopify, BigCommerce, Woocomerce, etc), or through our open-source Javascript packages.

It's pay-by-bank with instant clearance, with a bundled fraud chargeback guarantee, for 1%. No need to handle sensitive account details, either. Your customers log into their bank and store access tokens on their own hardware in the secure enclave.
one_liner: Bank transfers as payments for luxury retailers.
